<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Runelord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3020) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Class" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=397" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 240 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Runelord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=103)

**Prerequisites**
runelord specialization

</column>

---

Your rune magic increases, and you practice with your school's associated weapon. You gain an additional cantrip of your chosen arcane school, and each time you gain a level (including this level), you add an additional spell from your chosen arcane school to your [spellbook](/Equipment.aspx?ID=53), with the same restrictions as the two spells you normally add.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the runelord archetype.

<title level="2">Runelord Dedication leads to...</title>
[Embed Aeon Stone](/Feats.aspx?ID=3021), [Fused Polearm](/Feats.aspx?ID=3025), [Polearm Tricks](/Feats.aspx?ID=3023), [School Counterspell](/Feats.aspx?ID=3026), [School Spell Redirection](/Feats.aspx?ID=3027), [Sin Reservoir](/Feats.aspx?ID=3024)
name: Runelord Dedication
